Study.Protocol: The participant is seated with legs fully extended and feet flat against the box. With middle fingers stacked, the participant exhales and reaches forward as far as possible, holding the position for 2 seconds. Three trials are performed with a 30-second rest between trials.

Description.en: Measures posterior chain flexibility (hamstrings and lower back). The best of three trials is typically used for analysis.
Description.de: Misst die Flexibilität der hinteren Kette (Hamstrings und unterer Rücken). In der Regel wird der Bestwert aus drei Versuchen für die Analyse verwendet.

Technical.Equipment: Baseline Sit n' Reach Trunk Flexibility Box (Fabrication Enterprises, Inc)

Description.en: Measures posterior chain flexibility (hamstrings and lower back) using the Sit-and-Reach test. Participant seated, legs fully extended, feet flat against the Sit-and-Reach box (Baseline Sit n' Reach Trunk Flexibility Box; Fabrication Enterprises, Inc), middle fingers stacked. Participant exhales and reaches forward as far as possible, holds 2 seconds. Rest 30 seconds between trials. Pre-intervention, trial 1
Description.de: Measures posterior chain flexibility (hamstrings and lower back) using the Sit-and-Reach test. Participant seated, legs fully extended, feet flat against the Sit-and-Reach box (Baseline Sit n' Reach Trunk Flexibility Box; Fabrication Enterprises, Inc), middle fingers stacked. Participant exhales and reaches forward as far as possible, holds 2 seconds. Rest 30 seconds between Durchgangs. Pre-intervention, Durchgang 1

Description.en: Measures posterior chain flexibility (hamstrings and lower back) using the Sit-and-Reach test. Participant seated, legs fully extended, feet flat against the Sit-and-Reach box (Baseline Sit n' Reach Trunk Flexibility Box; Fabrication Enterprises, Inc), middle fingers stacked. Participant exhales and reaches forward as far as possible, holds 2 seconds. Rest 30 seconds between trials. Pre-intervention, trial 2

Description.en: Participant self-assessment of posterior chain flexibility (hamstrings and lower back), pre-intervention, completed independently after trials, "How well do you think you have performed this task?"
Description.de: Selbsteinschätzung des Teilnehmers bezüglich posterior chain flexibility (hamstrings and lower back), vor der Intervention, completed independently after Durchgangs, "Wie gut haben Sie diese Aufgabe Ihrer Meinung nach ausgeführt?"

Description.en: Participant self-assessment of sit and reach performance, mid-intervention, completed independently after trials, "How well do you think you have performed this task?"
Description.de: Selbsteinschätzung des Teilnehmers bezüglich der Sit-and-Reach-Leistung, während der Intervention, unabhängig nach den Versuchen ausgefüllt, "Wie gut haben Sie diese Aufgabe Ihrer Meinung nach ausgeführt?"

Description.en: Participant self-assessment of sit and reach performance, post-intervention, completed independently after trials, "How well do you think you have performed this task?"
Description.de: Selbsteinschätzung des Teilnehmers bezüglich der Sit-and-Reach-Leistung, nach der Intervention, unabhängig nach den Versuchen ausgefüllt, "Wie gut haben Sie diese Aufgabe Ihrer Meinung nach ausgeführt?"
